summary: Another variation of the Archmage robes, with a knotwork pattern. Male only.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Will be reworking the specular maps and cleaning the normal maps soon.

Another variation of the Archmage robes, with a knotwork pattern. Male only. This includes a custom hood texture as well.

The white fur can get blown out a bit if the bloom is too high on very sunny days, if this becomes an issue let me know and I will darken it some.

Some other variants I\'ve made can be found at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=766

I\'d like to do a female version of all of them but do not have the time until after the holidays.

Enjoy

  -Ludovico
author: Ludovico
